title: Fabletics COO on Expanding Retail Presence, Tech 'DNA'
description: Meera Bhatia, Fabletics Brand President and Chief Operating Officer, discusses the athleisure outlook and competition in activewear with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” She says the company invests in proprietary technology that powers both its website and in-store experience. (Source: Bloomberg)
